channel.title: 华尔街日报

item.title: 小企业管理局已开始将多达 200 亿美元、余额在 10 万美元或以下的拖欠 Covid 灾难贷款移交财政部催收
item.description:
The Small Business Administration has begun referring as much as $20 billion in delinquent Covid disaster loans with balances of $100,000 or less to the Treasury Department for collection https://t.co/KcZw5GLHRg https://t.co/KcZw5GLHRg

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: 在一连串的法律攻击中，就连 NCAA 的领导者也放弃了一个世纪以来反对有偿比赛的立场，现在他们只是在运动员是否是雇员的问题上争论不休。
item.description:
Amid a barrage of legal attacks, even NCAA leaders have dropped a century-old stand against pay-for-play—now they’re just fighting over whether the athletes are employees https://t.co/FJ7ja36rLf https://t.co/FJ7ja36rLf

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: 拜登政府宣布了一项为房主在某些抵押贷款上节省数千美元过户费的计划，推翻了业界的反对意见，而业界去年曾否决了一项类似计划
item.description:

item.title: 在纽约建房并非易事。把两栋联排别墅合并成一栋 42 英尺宽的豪宅？"人们会受到严重伤害"
item.description:

item.title: 气候数据初创公司 Gro Intelligence 的估值已降至 2,000 万至 2,500 万美元之间，在过去一周里，该公司在一笔交易中获得了投资者的救助，这可能会使其早期投资者血本无归。
item.description:

item.title: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）将其季度股息降至每股 1 美分，这是旨在增强人们对这家陷入困境的地区性银行信心的更广泛改革的一部分。
item.description:

item.title: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）告诉立法者，央行距离降息 "不远"，而且利率远高于温和通胀和适度增长时期的预期水平。

item.title: 阿拉巴马州法院做出判决后，全国范围内的讨论可能会使卡尔的公司和其他公司的测试受到严格审查。
item.description:
Nationwide debate following the Alabama court decision could draw scrutiny to tests from Carr’s company and others.

For Carr, the lines between the personal and the political often blur. https://t.co/AgtO4plLYX pic.twitter.com/7t8HdRlSF9

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: Temu 以 20 美元的夹克和 9 美元的不锈钢水瓶一举成名。仅一年时间，它就成为美国下载量最大的应用程序。这家电子商务公司的持续增长将如何重新定义这个行业。
item.description:
Temu exploded onto the scene with $20 jackets and $9 stainless steel water bottles. In just one year, it became the most-downloaded app in the U.S.

Here’s how the e-commerce company's continued growth could redefine the industry. https://t.co/8VX5Y9CtRO https://t.co/8VX5Y9CtRO

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: 让开，让开。新的地方恩怨是板球。美国各地的城市都在考虑为这项运动修建体育场馆，这引发了反弹和混乱："板球？就像在英格兰一样？为什么？
item.description:
Move aside pickleball. The new local feud is over cricket. Cities across the U.S. are weighing stadiums for the sport, sparking pushback and confusion: “Cricket? Like in England? Why?” https://t.co/2ntkmqfYbN https://t.co/2ntkmqfYbN

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: 一份被称为 "79号文件 "的中国指令扩大了将美国技术挤出中国的驱动力。有人称之为 "Delete A"（删除美国）。
item.description:
A Chinese directive known as Document 79 expands a drive that is muscling U.S. technology out of the country. Some refer to it as “Delete A”—for Delete America. https://t.co/7jXvWxKLLf https://t.co/7jXvWxKLLf

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024
